--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbr@d...> wrote:

> I didn't know that test case objects were being pooled.

They aren't.. at least as far as I can tell from diggin through the
JUnit source.  For each test method, the TestCase's constructor (eithe
no arg or a string arg) has newInstance called.  So there is indeed a
separate instance for each "public void test*()" method.

Dave
